website_summaries.verdict: Two different sizes offered to conform to your unique needs.
pros: Comes with a 100 percent satisfaction guarantee
Ultra option can hold up to 330 pounds
Choice of 22 or 25 millimeter bar for any hand size
Great for P90X, CrossFit or Insanity workouts
Fold-able design makes them perfect for travel
cons: The padding is minimal and customers complained about palm discomfort

customer_reviews.title: Great for arthritic wrists
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I was doing pushups against our kitchen table because my wrists can't take my full weight when they're bent. I can keep my wrists straight with these (i still use braces on my wrists) I feel like I'm getting more out of the pushups now and my wrists are getting stronger
customer_reviews.author: Sally Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be more stable
customer_reviews.text: They are solid, but rather small. A couple of times they have rolled on me. But like I said, it is a solid product, it is made well. In my opinion they are just a little too small. And I bought the larger size. It could be because I am 6 ft 5 inches tall, and my arms may possibly be a little more wider spread than most but in my opinion, they're not stable enough
customer_reviews.author: JGH

customer_reviews.title: solid pushup handles
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of pushup handles. Many others are made of plastic. These are steel with foam grips so the feel very solid. Also, some others have legs for stability. These are made so they are stable, but you still need to use your smaller stabilizing muscles for an even better pushup.
customer_reviews.author: bcaplin

customer_reviews.title: These are compact and well-built
customer_reviews.text: I don't review run-of-the-mill stuff. If I really like it a lot, or dislike it a lot, I review it. I like these a lot. I'm in my 60's and need to work my upper body. I bought these because they looked solid as a rock, small, and comfortable. And they are. Very highly recommended.... Tim
customer_reviews.author: timin8r

customer_reviews.title: Great, but I . understand stand stability concerns
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 different kinds of pushup bars, and this is set very comfortable on the hands. The foam on the bottom makes it more comfortable, but also more susceptible to rolling. I don't feel this is a big concern, and I use these over my other bars, but this product would be improved if it had a wider, longer footprints compared to how high your hands are off the floor. In other words, make the pyramid shape shorter and fatter. :-) . I'd buy them again if I lost these, no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I can do planks again!!
customer_reviews.text: Due to ongoing wrist issues, I have been unable to do planks for push-ups for some time now. Saw these push up bars on Amazon and they got good reviews so I just purchased them the other day. I LOVE them! I can do planks and push ups pain free again! I couldn't be happier with my purchase. They are exactly what I was looking for and you can't beat the price! I definitely recommend them for anyone like me who suffers from arthritis and cannot put their weight on a bent wrist. These bars allow me to keep my wrist flat and therefore pain-free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Push Up Bars!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these push up bars! I have been using them for about a week now, every day, and they are working as intended. I'm also a big guy (200+ lbs.) and they show no signs of bending. They are lightweight, sturdy, and comfortable to use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome except they hurt my hands lol idk maybe it's cause I'm 233? I need more padding. Hurt my wrists doing pushups, plank walks, inch worms. These are perf for those! No problems aside from the padding issue. But a messed up wrist is a lot worse for sure. Buy them! I regret not buying them right away.
customer_reviews.author: Marylyn

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The handles on these are comfy and non slip and the height is just right for me. I use these because placing my hands flat on the floor made my wrists hurt but these prevent that. They seem very sturdy! I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Strong , Solid , and Capable.
customer_reviews.text: First impressions upon opening was the solid, attractive design of these handles . I received these two days ago , and have a growing total of 185 pushups in, already for the week . They feel good in the hand , and sturdy during use . I expect to log a lot of pushups on these .
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hartford

customer_reviews.title: Not Stable
customer_reviews.text: The concept is good, but execution is poor. The width of the base, that is, the distance between the two bars, is too narrow, making it unstable. If you try to do a wide push up, these bars will roll outward on you. They only work for narrow push ups. They need to redesign these with a wider, more stable base. I am returning the ones I bought and looking for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Flamingo

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these push up bars. They are sturdy, easy to use, and exactly what I needed. I have a hand injury that makes push ups hard but these bars have made them so much easier to do. I am so grateful I came across them!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: These work great for me
customer_reviews.text: These work great for me. Another pair of push-up bars I bought were plastic and too weak for one-handed pushups. These, though, are very sturdy and they don't take up much space. I keep them in my gym bag and use them for workouts and during classes. I like that they nest together and are easy to grab and carry around. They really save my wrists!
customer_reviews.author: Knotyurz

customer_reviews.title: These got me back doing push-ups!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 52 yo man. I have always tried to keep in reasonable shape, & I know I have to keep at it as time goes by. Push ups have always been part of my regime, but it’s been a couple of years now that aging wrists have made me drop them. I have been really pleased that these “Maximizas” have got me back into this classic exercise. No pain! I’m also impressed how simple adjustments of the angle & width of the bars let me find & work a range of muscles. The goods turned up on time & strike me as good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Very strong, perfect for basic linear movements like flat push-ups
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly strong. The material on the bottom will shred pretty quick if used in asphalt, concrete, etc. Best if used on a rubber mat, carpet, hardwood, etc. It has a tendency to become unstable and can roll your wrists subsequently. That's really only if you choose to do push-up variations where you're forced to push from any other direction than up and down (e.g. prowler push-ups, push-ups with legs elevated aka "decline"). All in all, very solid product.
customer_reviews.author: I_MOVE_STUFF

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice
customer_reviews.text: These are great for maximizing depth for push-ups while keeping your wrists secure and stable. Comfortable without feeling like you’re going to break them or topple over.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Morales

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These have really eased the strain on my wrists. I use them for push ups, tri dips, planks, burpees,... all alerts of exercises. They’re really light so easy to run with for the outdoor bootcamp workouts I do. Sometimes, if your hand and body weight is a bit off center, it can feel like they’re going to tip forward.
customer_reviews.author: E. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for those with wrist injuries
customer_reviews.text: My wrist has been injured for a while from something I did at my job and doing push ups in a normal fashion was extremely painful making me resort to doing fist push ups which aren't too comfortable either. Push ups are a main part of my routine so I have been looking for alternatives. These were exactly what I needed and keep the wrists very stable while doing push ups. Would highly recommend to anyone dealing with a wrist problem.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: love this thing!!!
customer_reviews.text: great product! very solidly built, and very sturdy. you can take it almost any where and get a great work out.you'll be surprised how great a work out you can get buy just using your own body weight. i've already increased my arm and chest strength in just the short time i've been using it(about a month).i would recommend this to any one looking to get back in shape in a fast way.
customer_reviews.author: dasize34

customer_reviews.title: Had them about a month. So far, so good. Good build quality.
customer_reviews.text: Had them about a month. So far, so good. Good build quality. I don't feel them bending at all (I weigh over 200 pounds and several reviews for other, similar products mentioned issues with weight over 200 pounds). The cushioning is not perfect, but it looks like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have not put these things down since I received them. I like these because of the construction and the material they are made from. I am 6'3'', 300 lbs and they are able to support me with no problem. Come as one piece and are solidly stable! Good product, satisfied customer here!
customer_reviews.author: Juggernaut

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bars
customer_reviews.text: These are much better than the cheap plastic ones I purchased a few weeks ago and only a couple dollars more. Thick pipe is more comfortable on my hands. Plenty sturdy. Wish the cushion was a little less soft but overall great value.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They don’t slide on the floor. The foam grips are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: BeauBeau

customer_reviews.title: They feel sturdy and keep my wrists from getting sore
customer_reviews.text: These bars do exactly what I need them to do. They feel sturdy and keep my wrists from getting sore. I have noticed that I must be careful with the position I place them in, if I have my weight too far forward the back will start to lift up. I haven't used any other bars, so I assume this is simply an adjustment that I need to make. As long as I ensure I am in the proper position before I put any weight on them, I am fine.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Because of a hand condition I have I cannot flatten my hand to do pushups and other exercises on the floor. With this product I feel strong again.
customer_reviews.author: L & T

customer_reviews.title: Simple but effective
customer_reviews.text: Simple but effective push up bars. Super lightweight and they fit into each other making it easier to travel with. I do see the foam grips wearing off over time. However, they have held up and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I weigh about 165 lbs. These things support my weight perfectly, and the grip is comfortable. Excellent addition to my home gym. I especially like that they store so compactly.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Mann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent push up bars. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: These push up bars are extremely sturdy and very comfortable to use. I wanted bars that would allow me to do push ups without having my palms on the floor, but didn't want ones that twist and mess with your hand positioning. These come all in one piece, not like the ones that need to be assembled (more potential to fail). These seem to be of high quality and I expect them to last for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: E. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great for eliminating wrist pain during exercise
customer_reviews.text: I have recurrent wrist pain associated with a fracture I sustained 30 years ago. These allow me to perform pushups and prone/quadruped core stability exercises completely pain-free with my wrists in a neutral position which eliminates strain. I am 200 lbs and this product feels very stable and sturdy supporting my weight.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: A really nice product. My wrists always hurt when doing conventional push ups, and this helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: ClaytonTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Great push up bar!
customer_reviews.text: The frame is very sturdy and the shape gets me a bit off balance and helps with core stability. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: BearBear

customer_reviews.title: The ground clearace is good, light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ground clerance. I wish it was a little more broader, but I did not yet have any stability issues. I recomment to use gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised, great product
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy and comfortable, able to hold my weight even at an angle without an issue. Would recommend 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried a lot of push up handles and these are the BEST. very sturdy, no slip, nice comfortable grip, no screws to loosen up and easy to carry. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: E&F

customer_reviews.title: They work pretty good. They don't slide at all but were ...
customer_reviews.text: They work pretty good. They don't slide at all but were a bit wobbly at first, until I got used to them.
customer_reviews.author: pal

customer_reviews.title: Good for wrists not as high as normal pushup bars
customer_reviews.text: This definitely supports the wrists better, although I feel the height of the bars is lower than normal push up bars.
customer_reviews.author: Andres D. Cardeli

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as they said they were. Strong, sturdy and comfortable to use. I have bad wrists, and these make it so much easier to do exercises that involve your hands holding you up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice, light and sturdy but they are slim and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice, light and sturdy but they are slim and have a tendency to roll over if you're not really careful. Also the foam rubber slides on a concrete floor, but these are minor issues for a good product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: JCoon74

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy bars.
customer_reviews.text: I am using these pushup bars in my yoga class since I have weak wrists, these are helping to take the weight off them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: These are great I bought my friend an extra pair to use
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: I like them, but they claim to be more stable ...
customer_reviews.text: I like them, but they claim to be more stable then traditional push up stands and I've found just the opposite, but their stable enough. They are compact though and easier to pack and take up less space when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: These work great for deep push-ups. Only complaint is that the grips are too cushy.
customer_reviews.author: daverack

customer_reviews.title: Handle Bars Are A Little Short
customer_reviews.text: Bars a a little short. I’ve seen other push up bars with much longer hand bars which give you better stability. Shop around!
customer_reviews.author: Larry A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Stable
customer_reviews.text: I brought them to work to be used throughout the day. So far, they've held up quite well. They don't slip, yet adjust easily if you want to widen or narrow your posture. They are good for a variety of pushups, as well as dips. I am using them on smooth concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Wright

customer_reviews.title: terrible padding
customer_reviews.text: The foam padding on these is absolutely useless. If you are serious about using this product then I recommend something like Fat Gripz to put over the padding.
customer_reviews.author: miyagi

customer_reviews.title: Small but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad wrist, and this seems to help, over doing planks on the floor. I do wish it was more padded, maybe with a thicker gel, and then the anti-slip grips. We'll give a try over next few weeks and see how my wrist hold up.
customer_reviews.author: L.P.

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these push up bars. I use them quite a lot. They are very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: A&Z

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, help to maintain proper wrist position
customer_reviews.text: These are very well constructed and help a lot with my push up form! I usually have problems with my wrists during push ups, but these solve the problem! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Frances25

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly like it should
customer_reviews.text: Works just like one would expect. Much easier on the wrists since you keep them perpendicular to the floor, and allows for a deeper pushup. The construction is sturdy and provides good grip and proper stability. Rubberized grips for hands and base prevent slipping. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: The best out there
customer_reviews.text: Tried other push bars,but this is the easiest on my wrist. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: skeedo

customer_reviews.title: Solid Push Up Bars
customer_reviews.text: Just received and used for first time today. Solid bars, held my weight (200 lbs) + with no issues. Held firm on concrete, no slippage. Good product. Great vendor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Mick P

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and I don't worry about them breaking while doing ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and I don't worry about them breaking while doing handstand pushups like the plastic ones I previously had.
customer_reviews.author: D. Leaberry

customer_reviews.title: Should Surgery Approved.
customer_reviews.text: My husband had shoulder surgery last Dec. These have helped him gain strength without causing damage. He can now do push ups.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Arredondo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made. Have bought at least a dozen different types and will reorder these.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: im a big guy and the rubber parts are handling my use very well, my wrists are not hurting as bad as before, would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Urias

customer_reviews.title: Maximiza Push-up Bars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and solid for push ups, but after just a couple of months the grip material was already splitting and ripping apart. I like things that last, so not pleased with that
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy bars. Great for a heavy weight with wrist pains when doing regular push ups and dips
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy push up bars
customer_reviews.text: I previously used the perfect push ups but I am a big guy and had one pair break on me. The next pair was made of even more plastic and I always felt like they were going to snap. These are really sturdy and serve their purpose all while looking great
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, stable, light weight, sums this product up. You can't beat these, I feel safe using them.
customer_reviews.author: Bern

customer_reviews.title: Keep pushin
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t do pushups because i have a wrist fusion i can do them now with my new bars very nice compact product
customer_reviews.author: Mickey latter

customer_reviews.title: A W E S O M E ! ! !
customer_reviews.text: I've done over 4,000 push ups on these bars, and they show zero signs of wear. I weigh 230 pounds, and use them daily. They are A W E S O M E !
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK GRADY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was described. Works perfectly and sets in to itself nicely for convenient storage or travel.
customer_reviews.author: Alihi Weight

customer_reviews.title: Not especially well padded and it's a little wobbly as ...
customer_reviews.text: Not especially well padded and it's a little wobbly as it tends to roll along the curved portion. Otherwise OK.
customer_reviews.author: HP66

customer_reviews.title: Not good!
customer_reviews.text: The base is not wide enough. It flipped over. I am lucky it didn't hurt my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Test

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They're light and strong. Have been using 3 times a week for 3 months now. No signs of wear. I bought these after I had sprained my wrist and they allowed me to return to doing push-ups sooner than if I just had my hands flat on the floor. The grips can be a little slippery if you're sweaty, but I just put a rag or washcloth on each one and that solves the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stable push-up bars
customer_reviews.text: Use these for 60 push-ups a night. Padding needs to be 50% better but current padding is adequate after 1 month usage.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Paul Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gym
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and handsome bars. Compact for your gym bag and a good price
customer_reviews.author: Charlie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for wrist challenged
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I broke my wrist years ago so I need these to grip to do push-ups. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: David D. Campana

customer_reviews.title: The Ultimate Pushup Bars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of these pushup bars. Really stable and a great addition to my exercise regimen. No problems. Except I'm sore from getting carried away doing pushups.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works extremely great! 150lb female, love these versus the standard size, allows you to get lower.
customer_reviews.author: sportychick989

customer_reviews.title: Very useful.
customer_reviews.text: Equipment works great. Like other gym equipment which you have to grip, you may need to wear gym gloves to add more padding to your palms while using. It is not critical but just advise for those with more sensitive palms.
customer_reviews.author: capone

customer_reviews.title: This super strong product helps me get more comfortable push-ups
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the money! This super strong product helps me get more comfortable push-ups, so my wrists don't tweak so much..
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality construction, they work well on hard surfaces, not so well on carpet due to the rounded edges
customer_reviews.author: Ed P

customer_reviews.title: good for pumping muscles and shredding some ab fat
customer_reviews.text: After never using a pushup bar and not been able to get to the gym much, I wanted something that would give me a good muscle pump. I have been building nice lean muscle with medium use and as a bonus also been dropping some fat around my abs too! I have also noticed that even if I don't work hard I still feel and look like I have done a big work out and my arms and chest pop. def recommend for toning up and adding some muscle!!
customer_reviews.author: bowen walker

customer_reviews.title: These are great for allowing me to still do push-ups
customer_reviews.text: These are great for allowing me to still do push-ups, planks, downward dogs, etc. while supporting my wrists. I have terrible tendinitis from repetitive motion, and these have been great. I wish they were not quite so high, as it does throw off my form in a few poses, but they're definitely the best ones I've found so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, but I am not sure how long the foam will last.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: ... plastic bars started to crack and have been very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these when my plastic bars started to crack and have been very happy with this product. Comfortable on the hands and feels very sturdy, which helps minimize injuries when doing push ups - an issue I had with my plastic ones was that they had a slight wobble to them.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Cracel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are much nicer than the crappy plastic bars all over Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Cornholio

customer_reviews.title: Great gadegts
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, I can keep my wrists straight during a variety of workout and yoga poses.
customer_reviews.author: Bror

customer_reviews.title: but they are sturdy. I am a 240 lb
customer_reviews.text: Its only been a few weeks that I owned them, but they are sturdy. I am a 240 lb. guy and they feel secure when I use them. I'm sure the grips will deteriorate with time.
customer_reviews.author: Sensible_Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much perfect! Very sturdy and well made! While using these I do handstand push-ups and they never show even the slightest hint of coming apart. Love these things
customer_reviews.author: Spudman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but a little bit unstable
customer_reviews.text: It is light weight and quite sturdy. Only wish they were slightly longer so it doesn't roll easily during push-ups.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Very stable.
customer_reviews.text: These stands are easy on the grip and very stable. They make it easy to do your workouts almost anywhere on any surface.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, comfortable grips
customer_reviews.text: solid, sturdy, comfortable grips. Plastic bottoms slide a little on some surfaces, but I'm happy with them and use them often.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Su

customer_reviews.title: and I still struggled to find a comfortable grip. Apart from that this is a pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: The cushion on the grip could be a lot thicker. I was wearing workout gloves, and I still struggled to find a comfortable grip. Apart from that this is a pretty decent product.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: The best push-up bars around
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical at first about this item, but after reading the reviews, I was hooked. Plus, I looked at this item after finding out how poorly constructed the Bowflex Upper Cut was from reading what other reviewers said. My only gripe is that I'd like for the bars to be wider overall. But, that's minor compared to the fact that I can do many reps of push-ups and not have sore wrists afterwards. Very well done, Maxmiza!
customer_reviews.author: A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These will definitely work some additional muscle patterns as they let you get deeper in your pushups.
customer_reviews.author: self fix it man

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and a more effective push-up.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, after only a few weeks I've already increased how many push-ups I do each day. I've owned a different style of push-up bars once before and those felt like they were going to snap under my weight, these are really well made and very sturdy. They are also very comfortable plus I feel like I get a better work out due to the raised height of my hand position. The best thing by far is that they are a visual reminder to do push-ups, so I leave these on the floor of my bedroom where I can see them (I actually put them in the doorway so I almost trip over them!)
customer_reviews.author: John Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Solid Construction
customer_reviews.text: Frames feel solidly built - I don't sense any give/flex in them as I put my weight over them. Also, I think their design allows for better weigh distribution than the Everlast ones that I've used in the past - those have bent over time. Grips are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mugen.Justice

customer_reviews.title: I love that my wrists feel study and don't start to ...
customer_reviews.text: The bars were shipped in a timely manner! We have had them for a week and used them daily. It gives your upper body the correct posture so that my lower back doesn't ache. I love that my wrists feel study and don't start to hurt! The grip is perfect and has the correct amount of cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Palmieri

customer_reviews.title: I have not used any other push-up bars to compare ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not used any other push-up bars to compare them too, but they work well. They feel stable even in a wide push-ups.
customer_reviews.author: Oranda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Very light and durable. made my push easier
customer_reviews.author: Rix Valmeo

customer_reviews.title: and these are perfect for allowing me to comfortably and safely perform certain ...
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic wrist issues, and these are perfect for allowing me to comfortably and safely perform certain yoga and fitness exercises. They are stable, yet not heavy, and I do like the way they nestle together for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Good solid product
customer_reviews.text: My husband is pleased with these. Solid one-piece construction with nice padding.
customer_reviews.author: Kareful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, I spend a lot of time doing pushups and hand stands and these bars have just the right amount of padding and stabilization.
customer_reviews.author: Dave L.

customer_reviews.title: Very good and strong I'm 212lbs and bars does not move ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good and strong I'm 212lbs and bars does not move or bend . I have no issues this very useful . I would buy another one soon .

product_meta.title: Garren Fitness Maximiza Push Up Bars - Strong Chrome Steel Pushup Stands with Comfortable Foam Grip and Non-Slip Bars in Choice of 2 Sizes - Safe, Sturdy and Less Wrist Strain
product_meta.description:
’Push Up to Fitness’ with the Maximiza Push Up Bars by Garren Fitness

Each box contains one pair of Push Up Stands Features

- Strong, durable chrome steel bars and very stable - have no fear that they'll break, bend or collapse 
- Bar diameter of 22mm (~ 7/8 inch) for the Classic or 25mm (1 inch) for the Ultra 
- Each bar can hold 100kg (220lb) for the Classic or 150kg (330lb) for the Ultra 
- Classic 22mm will typically suit lighter people or people with smaller hands while the Ultra 25mm will suit heavier people or larger hands (typically men) 
- No parts, welds or joins - means no assembly required and no parts to break or fall off 
- They are stable and do not wobble 
- Light and portable 
- Comfortable foam grips 
- Non-slip Benefits

- Strengthen and sculpt shoulders, chest, arms and back 
- Integrate with any upper body workout program 
- Reduce stress on wrists 
- Promotes good form 
- Maximize your effort with deeper push-ups 
- Enables varied muscle use with more hand positions Garren Fitness' 100% Satisfaction Guarantee

If you aren’t completed satisfied, please contact us for a full refund – no questions asked. Buy one of each size and share them with your family or at the office
feature_bullets: PROTECTS WRISTS and REDUCES PAIN - enables you to maintain straight wrists so far less stress or strain on the wrists and joints which means you can do more hand positions and have no wrist pain - so you can do more and better push ups
STRONG, STURDY and STABLE - Ultra-strong Chrome Steel 25mm (1 Inch) bars with no joins, welds or pieces. No assembly required. They do not wobble or slip. Each Push-Up Bar holds up to 330lbs (150kg)
EASY TO USE - Portable, lightweight fitness equipment that are perfect for push-ups at home, gym, office, or travel. Stick them in your bag and you're all set
COMFORTABLE - foam hand pads, stable and non-slip. Your choice of 2 grip sizes - Ultra 25mm typically suits heavier people, men and larger hands.

DEEPER MORE INTENSE WORKOUTS - greater range of motion, deeper pushups and more push-up positions for varied muscle use. Build and tone muscles - target the triceps, biceps, lats, pecs, deltoids and abs. Great for Crossfit, Insanity or P90x
